verse: काषायान्न च भोजनादिनियमान्नो वा वने वासतो व्याख्यानादथ वा मुनिव्रतभराच्चित्तोद्भवः क्षीयते । किं तु स्फीतकलिन्दशैलतनयातीरेषु विक्रीडतो गोविन्दस्य पदारविन्दभजनारम्भस्य लेशादपि ।।

terms.काषायान्नः: By consuming food with impurities (like meat)
terms.मुनिव्रतभरात्: by observing the vows of a sage
terms.स्फीतकलिन्दशैलतनयातीरेषु: in the banks of overflowing river Yamuna
terms.पदारविन्दभजनारम्भस्य: who is engaged in the worship of His lotus feet

meaning: Meaning: Consuming food with impurities and following rules of eating, dwelling in the forest, or explaining scriptures may diminish mental purification. On the other hand, even a little engagement in the worship of Lord Govinda's lotus feet while playing in the overflowing banks of river Yamuna, surpasses all these for purifying the mind.
